name: Night Raid (itch) (Deuronius)
description:
The Notorious Darkoids are at it again, the second night falls they loom in the sky destroying our utilities, although we can't see them our radar picks them up as clear as day and with that you can destroy all them critters to Kingdom come!

It's like the game Battle ships, you need tact accuracy and patience to pull off a successful Hit...so when you do hit something oh it feels good.
